title: Modern 2 Bedroom in Old City with Parking Included
description:
This stunning condominium, located in the renowned Nouveau Condominiums, offers a modern and stylish living experience. With 2 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms, this home provides a comfortable and spacious environment for you to enjoy.
Step inside and be greeted by the beautiful natural wood floors that exude warmth and elegance throughout the space adding to the warmth is the modern gas fireplace. The floor to ceiling, insulated and sound reducing windows bring nature into your living room, with lush green gardens, and flowering trees, the living room feels like you're floating in an enchanted garden.
The open-concept layout seamlessly connects the living, dining, and kitchen areas, creating a perfect space for entertaining guests or relaxing with loved ones. The kitchen boasts sleek and contemporary features, including Miele appliances, honed soapstone countertops, and ample Poggenpohl cabinet space, allowing you to unleash your culinary creativity. Whether you're preparing a quick meal or hosting a dinner party, this kitchen will exceed your expectations.
The two bedrooms provide a tranquil retreat, each with its own private bathroom. The primary bedroom offers a serene sanctuary, complete with an ensuite bathroom featuring modern fixtures and finishes. Just off the primary is a sleek balcony large enough for lounge seating, and a bistro table. The additional bedroom is equally inviting and can be utilized as a guest room, home office, or whatever suits your lifestyle.
Nouveau Condominiums itself is an exceptional building with a host of amenities to enhance your living experience. Enjoy a secure entrance, deeded parking, and tranquil green space. Situated in the heart of Old City, this home grants you unparalleled access to the rich history and culture that surrounds you.
Listing courtesy of Keller Williams Philadelphia

title: Sunny, spacious West Philly 1 br
description:
Hello! I'm a current tenant with New Horizons Housing looking for someone to take over my apartment with a new 12 month lease. Your lease can start any time in July and rent will be prorated for the month.
The space is bright and sunny 2nd floor rear unit, in walking distance to Clark Park, UPenn, Baltimore Avenue Shopping, and lots of public transportation options. 1 large bedroom with 2 windows let in plenty of natural light, featuring a walk in closet which also contains a bathroom. Also off the bedroom is another small room with a window that can be used as a closet or an office.
The living room also has a large hall closet plus a bathroom, as well as plenty of space for additional storage options. The kitchen is small but workable.  Willing to part with the additional counter space and storage I added. Air conditioner units also for sale.
Pay by app laundry in the basement, off street parking available for additional cost, laundromat across the street.
Here's some need to knows:
-Heat/hot water included in rent. Cooking gas is a flat fee of $25 paid to the landlord.
-They require renters insurance - $12.50/month through landlord. I got my own policy through Lemonade closer to 100 for the year.
-You are responsible for internet (comcast) and electric. I am on the budget electric plan and have been paying $54/month.
The landlord is New Horizons. They're always good about fixing things in a timely manner and communicating any issues. You will be signing a lease directly with them for 12 months. These are their requirements:
-$50 non-refundable application fee
- minimum 625 credit score with no prior evictions
(If you do not have a reported score (N/A), proof of attendance to a local university can be used to circumvent the required credit score)
-First month, last month, and one month security deposit to move in. (First month prorated to # of days left in the month)
-Proof of income (net approx. 3x rent/month)
-Co-signers/guarantors allowed on an approval basis

title: Spacious 1 bed 1 bath Condo
description: 1 bed 1 bath Condo in an upscale LUXURY HIGH RISE BUILDING with 24 hour Concierge / Security and VERY LOW CONDO FEES in the centrally located and sought after neighborhood of Washington Square West in downtown Philadelphia. The historic Western Union Building featuring Beaux Arts style of the time, was originally built 100 years ago as the headquarters of Western Union Telegraph Company, and was beautifully and tastefully expanded and redesigned into a luxury 12- story boutique residence by Philadelphia's renowned architect Cecile Baker in 2008. The unit itself: Nestled on the 5th floor (enabling you to take the steps OR the elevator which many people like), this very quiet spot faces the courtyard, giving it an air of peace and tranquility. Upon entering, you will note the quaint foyer, which acts as a buffer to the main living area on one side and the bedroom and bath on the other (which isn't alway the case with these size condos) . You will fall for its souring ceilings and large windows (which make the unit feel more spacious), open floor plan, modern kitchen and solid hardwood flooring! The bedroom is plenty big for a king, and boasts a large walk in closet. There is a coat closet and an in unit Washer/Dryer included in the sale. A perfect first time purchase, downsize purchase, or pied de terre for someone looking for the convenience, luxury, security and peace of mind of a full service Center City building where PARKING IS AVAILABLE ON SITE for an extra monthly fee. The low condo fee includes water, sewer, gas cooking, a fitness center, and a courtyard with a private secure dog run. One of the great things about Wash West is its central location: less than 7 blocks in any direction to most of the great neighborhoods , historic squares and parks of Philadelphia: walkable to beautiful Washington Square and Rittenhouse Square, to the vibrant arts district on Broad St, to Restaurant Row; an easy walk to the center city business district and neighborhoods like Old City, Bella Vista, Queen Village and the Italian Market, all offering award winning dining, shopping and nightlife - and very close to public transportation and Jefferson Hospital!

title: LUXURY HIGH RISE BUILDING 1 bed 1 bath Condo
description: affordable 1 bed 1 bath Condo in an upscale LUXURY HIGH RISE BUILDING with 24 hour Concierge / Security and VERY LOW CONDO FEES in the centrally located and sought after neighborhood of Washington Square West in downtown Philadelphia. The historic Western Union Building featuring Beaux Arts style of the time, was originally built 100 years ago as the headquarters of Western Union Telegraph Company, and was beautifully and tastefully expanded and redesigned into a luxury 12- story boutique residence by Philadelphia's renowned architect Cecile Baker in 2008. The unit itself: Nestled on the 5th floor (enabling you to take the steps OR the elevator which many people like), this very quiet spot faces the courtyard, giving it an air of peace and tranquility. Upon entering, you will note the quaint foyer, which acts as a buffer to the main living area on one side and the bedroom and bath on the other (which isn't alway the case with these size condos) . You will fall for its souring ceilings and large windows (which make the unit feel more spacious), open floor plan, modern kitchen and solid hardwood flooring! The bedroom is plenty big for a king, and boasts a large walk in closet. There is a coat closet and an in unit Washer/Dryer included in the sale. A perfect first time purchase, downsize purchase, or pied de terre for someone looking for the convenience, luxury, security and peace of mind of a full service Center City building where PARKING IS AVAILABLE ON SITE for an extra monthly fee. The low condo fee includes water, sewer, gas cooking, a fitness center, and a courtyard with a private secure dog run. One of the great things about Wash West is its central location: less than 7 blocks in any direction to most of the great neighborhoods , historic squares and parks of Philadelphia: walkable to beautiful Washington Square and Rittenhouse Square, to the vibrant arts district on Broad St, to Restaurant Row; an easy walk to the center city business district and neighborhoods like Old City, Bella Vista, Queen Village and the Italian Market, all offering award winning dining, shopping and nightlife - and very close to public transportation and Jefferson Hospital!
